attributes.action: Allow American Classic & Sports cars to forgo the displaying of a front number plate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A large number of Classic & sports cars manufactured in the USA are designed to have no front number plate, fitting  front plates often spoil the asthetics of the vehicles.

Due to the small number of USA cars in the UK & the low mileage covered by the careful owners, I do not see how this would affect the policing of our roads.

Also as there are such a small ammount of these vehicles on the roads, they should be easily identified if they were to be caught breaking any traffic violation.

Bearing in mind motorcycles do not currently display front plates I do not see any downside to this petition.
